verbs.description: pedestrianize (third-person singular simple present pedestrianizes, present participle pedestrianizing, simple past and past participle pedestrianized)

entries.meaning: (transitive) To restrict access to (a street) to pedestrians only, disallowing motor vehicles.
examples: Our trade has increased significantly since they pedestrianized the High Street.

entries.meaning: (intransitive, dated) To walk; to travel on foot.
